original_title: Fuck My Wife I'll Do The Barmaid
overview: Getting inebriated at a bar can have surprising consequences! You might want to offer your wife to the dude at the other end of the counter. He has been eyeing her ans she thinks he is hot. But is it because you want a free hand with the statuesque barmaid? Keep drinking the good stuff and soon you'll be hallucinating! You're steps away from endless possibilities. It's actually sort of mind blowing! Is a foursome one of your hidden fantasies? Or is it really happening? And yeah, given the pedigree here, you can expect some surprise sex performances. Check out Cherry, Lucky and Cindy hitting the bottle and offering the yummiest, wettest hot holes ever served! Oh well, it's just sex anyway! And it won't give you a hangover tomorrow.
title: Fuck My Wife I'll Do The Barmaid
